feedback.title: Successful activation
feedback.description: You activated your account, let's use it and log in!

feedback.title: Mail sent
feedback.description: A message has been sent to you by email with instructions on how to activate your account.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your e-mail address! We send you a mail with a link to reset your password.

feedback.title: Mail sent
feedback.description: A message has been sent to you by email with instructions on how to reset your password.

feedback.title: Done
feedback.description: Your password has been reset. Please log-in to your account with your new password!

feedback.title: The link expired
feedback.description: It looks that your link might expired or you misspelled something.
